::Hot Rod::

His weapons were armed, and he stood ready to fire if needed.

::Epyon::

He also stood ready for combat.

::Demolition::

"So how do we get out with this lockdown?" He asks Unitron.

::DrillBit::

"Maybe so. Hmmm, it might not have been Alliance, I just assumed because
that would have been in range of the Alliance."

::Dollen::

He looks over too Dark Mouse.
"I'll live."
